msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Puget Sound Regional Branch

org.orgName: District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington

div1.p: Territory of Washington vs. C. H. Hutchingson } Criminal Warrant

To the sheriff or any constable of said County Whereas W. H. Harris has this day complained in writing under oath to the undersigned one of the Justice of the Peace in and for said County that C. H. Hutchinson did on the 31st day of October A.D. 1885 at said County did Fradulent and feloniously embezzle and Fraudulently convert to his own use two Hundred and forty Dollars belonging to the said W. H. Harris.
Therefore in the name of the United States you are commanded forthwith to apprehend the said C. H. Hutchinson and bring him before me to the dealt with according to law.
Given under my hand this 11th day of Nov. A.D. 1885
Alex Campbell Justice of the Peace
Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs Hutchinson Defendant

Justice of the Peace hereby authorizing W.H is a special Constable to execute this
Alex Camblell Justice of the Peace
FILED NOV 12 1885 James Seavey, Clerk By James P. Ludlow Deputy Clerk.
